evidence.text: a.  Assume jurisdiction over this matter;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Assume jurisdiction over this matter;

evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: b.  Certify this action as a class action on behalf of the proposed Petitioner Class, appoint the Petitioners as class representatives, and appoint the undersigned counsel as class counsel;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Certify this action as a class action on behalf of the proposed Petitioner Class, appoint the Petitioners as class representatives, and appoint the undersigned counsel as class counsel;

evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: c.  Grant a temporary restraining order to preserve the status quo pending further proceedings;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant a temporary restraining order to preserve the status quo pending further proceedings;

evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: d.  Enjoin Respondents from transferring Petitioners out of this district during the pendency of this litigation;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Enjoin Respondents from transferring Petitioners out of this district during the pendency of this litigation;

evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: e.  Grant a writ of habeas corpus to Petitioners that enjoins Respondents from removing them pursuant to the Proclamation;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant a writ of habeas corpus to Petitioners that enjoins Respondents from removing them pursuant to the Proclamation;

evidence.text: h.  Award Petitioners’ counsel reasonable attorneys’ fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act, and any other applicable statute or regulation;
